project_name.description: Enter a short, descriptive name for this project (used in names, paths)

bundle_purpose.description: Select the primary purpose (e.g., ETL, Analytics, ML Training, ML Inference)

databricks_host_prod.description: Enter the Databricks workspace URL for the PROD environment

workspace_root_path.description: Enter the root path in the Databricks workspace for deployment (e.g., /Shared/Bundles)

team_permission_group.description: Enter the Databricks group name for team MANAGE permissions (optional, leave blank if none)
